features: Comprehensive Exfoliation: Our Infina Essentials Face Exfoliator acts as an aha exfoliant and bha exfoliant, providing gentle yet thorough exfoliation for face. This chemical exfoliant for face infused with salicylic acid promotes clear, radiant skin

Power-Packed Face Toner: Our facial toner, perfect for acne-prone skin, doubles as a glycolic acid toner and salicylic acid toner. A face toner for women designed to balance and rejuvenate, making it an ideal part of anti-aging regimens

Refreshing Duo: This beauty kit for women combines the potent benefits of a face exfoliator and toner for face, providing a complete skincare routine. The skin exfoliator for face and facial toner work together to enhance your natural beauty

Quality Skin Care Products: Our chemical exfoliant and toner are part of an elite skin care set, created for a comprehensive skincare routine. The liquid exfoliant for face and face toner for women anti-aging aim to nourish and renew your skin

Essential Beauty Kit: This skin care kit, including a bha liquid exfoliant and facial toner for aging skin, targets common skin issues. This skin care set of facial skin care products is a must-have beauty kit for women aiming for youthful, vibrant skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Salicylic Acid: Clear, Confident Skin Salicylic acid is a powerful ingredient renowned for its acne-fighting properties. With its gentle exfoliating action, salicylic acid helps to remove dead skin cells, leaving your skin smoother, clearer, and more confident. Papaya Extract: Nature's Enzymatic Glow Papaya extract contains vitamins and antioxidants that nourish and protect the skin, leaving it with a healthy, youthful glow. Castor Oil: Nourish, Strengthen, Transform Castor oil deeply moisturizes the skin to help improve the texture and elasticity. Aloe Vera: Soothing, Hydrating Feel Aloe vera is a natural moisturizer that hydrates the skin without clogging pores, making it suitable for all skin types

Shake the bottle and apply a small amount of Infina Exfoliant on damp skin. Rinse off the exfoliant thoroughly with lukewarm water and apply Infina Toner. Allow the toner to dry naturally on your skin, and do not rinse it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle But Effective Skin Care With Aloe Vera
reviews.reviewText: I love this product. I use Infina BHA Facial Exfoliant & Facial Toner almost every day. I like that the facial exfoliant has fine granules but not too fine. I'm not into coarse granules that hurt or cause damage to my skin. This feels good on your skin, and I look forward to using it. Both facial products feature 2% BHA and salicylic acid which exfoliate, tone and are perfect for acne-prone skin. My skin isn't acne prone but it is sensitive and my skin is a fan.There is a slight fragrance, but not overpowering. I typically use the facial exfoliant while I'm in the shower because it's easier to thoroughly rinse off the granules there. I simply scrub for a couple of minutes which may be long for others, but I really like the way the product feels on my skin, and it looks polished afterward. It also doesn't feel dry.As for the toner, I like it for many reasons: one that it's thicker than water; it's slightly gelatinous. It doesn't have a watery consistency but it's not as thick as a gel, it's somewhere in the middle. So, there’s better control over how much product is dispensed. After using the toner, my skin feels hydrated to the point of forgetting (or being lazy) and forgoing a moisturizer because it looks and feels moisturized after using this BHA toner. It probably isn't, but that's how it makes my skin look.I like that for both products’ have aloe vera second on the ingredient list. I look for products that have aloe vera in them because I believe in its healing and beautifying properties. Sure, there's a lot of other crap in the ingredient list I refuse to attempt to pronounce, but I like the products and I like them together. I will certainly visit the storefront for more products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice exfoliating and toner duo
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice exfoliator and toner duo. It uses both chemical and physical exfoliants. The toner uses both aha and BHA as well. When using this I was very surprised but my face didnt sting which happens when I use chemical exfoliants sometimes. It does help smooth out the skin, help with oil control, and my pores do seem to be a bit smaller although my pores are naturally not huge so it's kind of hard to tell.I really like the sun exposure warning. I sometimes see products that can make you more sun sensitive (most notably retinols) but there is no mention anywhere on the product. It's almost dangerous because you can burn much easier. It's less severe of a sun sensitivity with bhas and ahas, but putting on sunscreen is always a good idea, even though I get lazy sometimes and just try and avoid direct sunlight like a vampire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good ingredients, toner is great
reviews.reviewText: Did not come with brand new foil under the caps. The facial exfoliant was nice and creamy with a sandy scrubbing texture for the exfoliation. Even though I got this for my teenage son( he has sensitive skin like me but with lot of pimples) I’ve tried both on my monthly and it worked great. For someone who only gets pimples during that time, I didn’t get any while I used this. For my son, he doesn’t use the exfoliant every day, maybe every other day and the toner twice a day. Wish this was a 3 pack with the cleanser to compare to but my son likes these enough I might get it to try for him anyways. I know this is geared towards women, but my kid has my skin just with pimples and this works well for him without being harsh and drying like most men’s products. I think this is at an excellent price point for the amount you get. The scent on both is mild and really neutral. If I can pin point any scent I would say slightly pineapple or papaya and it doesn’t stick around. Definitely can’t smell it after rinsed off. I would definitely get this again. 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Two Pack of Skincare products.
reviews.reviewText: You receive Two 8oz plastic bottles one containing face toner and the other bottle containing an exfoliator. The facial toner is designed to PH balance your facial skin after you have used the exfoliant. The exfoliating process is designed to remove dead skin cells and help to even your skins tone.Both of the products are working good on my skin. I wish that the face toner had a different method to remove the product since it’s so thin in nature like most toners are. Both of the bottles have flip top half moon caps. Having that type of cap for the exfoliator is perfectly fine. But since the toner is thin, it’s hard to control it’s flow when you’re removing the product. If you use a cotton pad or cotton ball, it makes it easier to control the skin toner while attempting to remove the product.Obviously use the exfoliator fist, then finish your skincare routine with the skin toner. Neither of the products have irritated my skin nor do they have a bad scent. In my opinion, the exfoliator is in between thin to medium, right in the middle. If it was much thicker, to me it would make it more difficult to spread and use on your skin. So the consistency is fine to me. It has pretty much the same grit level as it’s consistency.I Do Recommend this Two Pack of Quality Made products. They work good on my skin and are priced fairly.I Hope you find my review Helpful, Thanks for Reading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good value but not the best
reviews.reviewText: Two 8 ounce bottles of exfoliator and toner, this will last a year. The exfoliator does a decent job of removing dead skin cells and leaving the skin feeling smoother and refreshed. The BHA liquid exfoliant contains beta hydroxy acid, which is known for its ability to penetrate deep into the pores and help unclog them. This can lead to a reduction in the appearance of pores over time, which is a definite plus for those struggling with enlarged pores. The toner component of this product provides additional benefits by balancing the skin's pH levels and prepping it for the subsequent steps in your skincare routine. It has a lightweight formula that absorbs quickly into the skin, which is great for those who prefer a non-greasy finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think it's working
reviews.reviewText: The face wash and toner seem to be working for me. It is really leaving my face moisturized. I no longer need to use lotion on my face after I use the toner. It does not leave me oily or dry. The face wash is exfoliating. They do not have a strong or noticeable scent to them which is good because I am not a scent person and scents give me a headache. I'm not sure if my pores are getting smaller but I do have less pimples popping up and when they do they are small.
